title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A story about the American dream in the Jazz Age.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel about totalitarianism and surveillance.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A novel about racial injustice in the Deep South.

title: Moby-Noby
author: Herman Melville
description: The story of Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to kill a giant whale.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who shot her husband and then stopped speaking. A psychotherapist is determined to uncover her secrets.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A classic romance novel exploring class, marriage, and societal expectations.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A coming-of-age story about the struggles of adolescence.
